energy.usef.core.workflow.WorkflowStep

  • Packages that use WorkflowStep 
    Package Description
    energy.usef.agr.workflow.step
    Example AGE Workflow step.
    energy.usef.brp.workflow.step
    Example BRP Pluggable Business Components.
    energy.usef.core.workflow.step
    Step helper classes for the workflow core.
    energy.usef.dso.workflow.step
    Example DSO Workflow step.
    energy.usef.mdc.workflow.step
    This package contains the PBC step implementations for the MDC role.

      Stub implementation of the PBC which is in charge of setting the ADS goals via the PowerMatcher.

      Stub implementation of the PBC which is in charge of deciding to re-create or not A-Plans and or D-Prognoses after the re-optimization of the portfolio.

      class  AgrValidateSettlementItemsStub
      Stub implementation of a the PBC handling received FlexOrderSettlementDto.
